nodes.text: The Terrelia system was a star system located in the the galaxy's Inner Rim at coordinates L-14. It was the home of the Terrelian Jango Jumper species and contained the planet Terrelia.

The Terrelia system was first mentioned in the March 15, 2011 update to Star Wars: The Essential Atlas Online Companion, a series of online appendices published on StarWars.com to supplement the text of the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace.
